com.omertron.bgg.apibuilder

Class ApiService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.omertron.bgg.apibuilder.ApiService

  • public class ApiService
extends Object

    HTTP method execution.

    Parts of the code for this class are from Nabeel Mukhtar's github-java-sdk library.

    Author:
    Jake Wharton
